title: xwenyb
author: xwenyb
content: :)AICOS Pre-sale Announcement :DThe AICOS Pre-sale will commence on June 1st at 12:00 PM (GMT) and will last for a period of fifteen days, concluding on June 15th at 12:00 PM (GMT). :-*The initial pre-sale price is set at 0.0001 BNB per token. To make a purchase, simply copy the provided link and enter your wallet. The minimum purchase amount is 0.1 BNB, and the maximum limit is 10 BNB. ;)To enhance the gaming experience, the AICOS Pre-sale will adopt a team-based approach. Teams must consist of a minimum of two members. Individuals invited to purchase tokens using an invitation code will be considered your teammates. As a captain, you can get 10% of the consumption of the team members as a direct reward, and you can also get 5% of the subordinate consumption of the team members as an indirect reward, and there are more class rewards.When the team size reaches ten members, the team leader will receive an additional 10% of the total team consumption.When the team size reaches twenty members, the team leader will receive an additional 13% of the total team consumption.When the team size reaches thirty members, the team leader will receive an additional 17% of the total team consumption.When the team size reaches forty members, the team leader will receive an additional 22% of the total team consumption.When the team size reaches fifty members, the team leader will receive an additional 28% of the total team consumption.When the team size reaches sixty members or more, the team leader will receive an additional 35% of the total team consumption.Team leaders who meet the requirements can contact the official Telegram group administrator for verification after the pre-sale and receive additional rewards. All rewards will be distributed in the form of BNB.Official website: https://www.aichaincosmos.comTelegram: https://t.me/aichaincosmosofficialBtok: https://d65535.com/aichaincosmosofficialTwitter: https://twitter.com/AIChainCosmosDiscord: https://discord.gg/fdnw44z45vQQ group in China: 545010192Email: aichaincosmos@gmail.comThank you for your attention.AI-Chain Cosmos Team
